summary.span: 表示 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象封装有关应用程序的安全决策。 objects encapsulate security decisions about an application.

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口，可用于在集合内移动。The implements the interface that allows you to move within a collection. 使用指向当前获取项的属性的集合中。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用方法移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用方法将枚举数移到其初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator to its initial position. > [!NOTE] > 创建枚举器，或使用后方法来重新枚举器定位到起始位置的集合，然后必须调用方法将枚举数定位到的第一项。After you create the enumerator, or use the method to reposition the enumerator to the start of the collection, you must then call the method to position the enumerator to the first item. 否则，该项表示未定义属性。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined.

span.span: Removes the specified application trust from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜索整个集合，并删除指定的应用程序信任的所有实例。The entire collection is searched, and all instances of the specified application trust are removed. 请按照已删除的对象的对象上移以占据空出的位置。The objects that follow the removed objects move up to occupy the vacated positions. 移动的对象的索引也会更新。The indexes of the objects that are moved are also updated.

summary.span: 从集合中移除与指定条件匹配的所有应用程序信任对象。

span.span: Removes all application trust objects that match the specified criteria from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过精确的版本匹配，依赖于的值标识的应用程序信任`versionMatch`参数。The application trust can be identified by an exact version match, dependent upon the value of the `versionMatch` parameter. 方法用于查找所有匹配的应用程序信任，并从集合中移除的匹配项。The method is used to locate all matching application trusts, and the matching items are removed from the collection. 请按照已删除的对象的对象上移以占据空出的位置。The objects that follow the removed objects move up to occupy the vacated positions. 移动的对象的索引也会更新。The indexes of the objects that are moved are also updated.
